Books I Liked in 2024

Published: December 30, 2024 Time: 19 sec read
Tags: books, reading, favorites, literature

Here are some of the books I liked in 2024:

  • Thus Spoke Zarathustra — Friedrich Nietzsche
  • The Metamorphosis — Franz Kafka
  • May Contain Lies — Alex Edmans
  • The Chimp Paradox — Steve Peters
  • Man’s Search for Meaning — Viktor E. Frankl

I also started using Goodreads this year — feel free to friend me here if you want to exchange book recommendations.
